author: cziegeler
msg: SLING-3401 : Support multiple bundles for jarWebSupport
Add support for reading multiple bundles when directly reading the maven xml (lifecycle participant) and add support to define several bundles in the dependencies.properties file

author: rhuijben
msg: In the libsvn_client diff handling: replace the output argument of the anchor
base argument with a pair of root_relpath and root_is_dir values.
These two booleans should allow cleaning up the remaining 'dual calculations'
of anchors in the diff code.
The diff runner and diff writer have/had deep knowledge about each others
about this handling and covered for bugs on the other side. This is pumbing
in preparation for replacing this with the usage of generic diff driver rules.
(svn_client__arbitrary_nodes_diff): Move function here and update output
(diff_repos_repos): Update output arguments. Remove filter that isn't
necessary if our caller wants to do the filtering based on what we
(svn_wc__diff7): Update argument. Always root at parent directory when we
can tell the caller about this. (This fixes driving a root replacement)

author: markt
msg: Add a test case that demonstrates Bug 56147 is not reproducible.

author: markt
msg: Tomcat 8 requires Java 7 so make that the default compiler source and target versions for JSP compilation.

author: mxmanghi
msg: * src/rivetcmds/rivetCore.c: spurious ref count decrement caused random crashes
* src/rivetcmds/rivetInspect.c: fixed behaviour when inspect is passed with an undefined argument value
* configure.ac: reindented some function to improve readability and editor independence
